abstract: Tony La Russa has 2,728 career wins, 35 short of John McGraw, who is second on the career list.
snippet: Tony La Russa has 2,728 career wins, 35 short of John McGraw, who is second on the career list.
lead_paragraph: Tony La Russa does many infuriating things as a manager. He changes pitchers frequently, he sours on young players quickly and he seems to be constantly trying to outsmart the opposing manager. He also wins baseball games. Lots and lots of baseball games.

headline.main: La Russa Closing In on McGraw on Career List
